attributes.action: make trespass on inland waters a criminal offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Canoeing and swimming on privately owned waters is conflicting with environmental and other sporting interests. Riparian owners have limited power to control the use of rivers and streams under the present laws of trespass. Making such trespass a criminal offence will enable owners to exercise their reponsibility to safeguard the envrionment and protect the enjoyment of their rights.
